title: The Writer's Almanac - Wednesday, April 7, 2021
description: Poet William Wordsworth was born on this day in England, 1770. We feature his poem “I Have Thoughts that Are Fed by the Sun” for his birthday.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Poet William Wordsworth was born on this day in England, 1770. We feature his poem “I Have Thoughts that Are Fed by the Sun” for his birthday.
